description: Shopee Open Platform is a platform providing Open APIs and services for developers serving Shopee sellers with different ecommerce needs

platform_features.name: Powerful APIs
platform_features.description: Access to APIs for orders, products, marketing and push notification services

platform_features.name: Developer Services
platform_features.description: End-to-end developer support including onboarding, APP development, testing, release, and maintenance

platform_features.name: Management Tools
platform_features.description: Manage APPs, access testing tools, test accounts and sandbox environments

user_types.description: Access to comprehensive range of Open APIs for software businesses
Can develop software tailored to business needs and integrate systems
